title: Ethereum edges near $4000 as EigenLayer becomes second-largest DeFi protocol
description:
Ethereum, the second-largest digital asset by market capitalization, is trading near the pivotal $4000 milestone for the first time since December 2021, up 15% during the past week. description: The Optimism Foundation recently sold approximately 19.5 million OP tokens, valued at nearly $90 million, to an unnamed buyer, with these tokens being sourced from the unallocated segment of their OP Token treasury initially set aside as working capital. title: Conflux Network introduces AxHKD, Hong Kong Dollar-Backed Stablecoin
description: Toronto, Canada, March 8th, 2024, Chainwire Conflux Network, the only regulatory compliant public blockchain in China, today announces its pivotal role in assisting the successful beta-testing of the Hong Kong Dollar (HKD)-backed stablecoin, AxHKD. Built by local fintech company AnchorX, the stablecoin will be launched on Conflux Network initially, followed by Ethereum. Conflux will provide […]
